name: Cover Sheet
condition: Required for every proposal submission.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Project Summary
condition: Required for every proposal submission.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Table of Contents
condition: Required for every proposal submission, automatically generated by the NSF system.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Project Description (Standard Research)
condition: Required for standard research proposals and others unless specified otherwise; content/page limits may vary for specific proposal types.
user_question: Is this a standard research proposal (or another type using the standard 15-page limit)?

name: Project Description (Planning Proposal)
condition: Required specifically for Planning Proposals, replacing the standard Project Description.
user_question: Is this a Planning Proposal?

name: Project Description (RAPID Proposal)
condition: Required specifically for Rapid Response Research (RAPID) Proposals, replacing the standard Project Description.
user_question: Is this a Rapid Response Research (RAPID) Proposal?

name: Project Description (EAGER Proposal)
condition: Required specifically for EArly-concept Grants for Exploratory Research (EAGER) Proposals, replacing the standard Project Description.
user_question: Is this an EArly-concept Grants for Exploratory Research (EAGER) Proposal?

name: References Cited
condition: Required for every proposal submission.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Budget
condition: Required for every proposal submission, detailing costs for each year of support requested.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Budget Justification
condition: Required for every proposal submission to detail and justify costs.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Facilities, Equipment and Other Resources
condition: Required for every proposal submission to describe resources available.
user_question: Is this an NSF proposal submission?

name: Biographical Sketch
condition: Required for each individual designated as senior/key personnel.
user_question: Does the proposal identify any senior/key personnel?

name: Current and Pending (Other) Support
condition: Required for each individual designated as senior/key personnel.
user_question: Does the proposal identify any senior/key personnel?

name: Synergistic Activities
condition: Required for each individual designated as senior/key personnel.
user_question: Does the proposal identify any senior/key personnel?

name: Authorization to Deviate from NSF Proposal Preparation Requirements
condition: Required only if the proposal deviates from PAPPG/solicitation requirements and prior written NSF authorization was obtained.
user_question: Does this proposal deviate from standard NSF requirements based on prior written authorization from an NSF AD/Office Head or designee?

name: List of Suggested Reviewers or List of Reviewers Not to Include
condition: Optional document submitted as a Single Copy Document.
user_question: Is providing an optional list of suggested reviewers or reviewers not to include required for this proposal?

name: Proprietary or Privileged Information Statement
condition: Required as a Single Copy Document only if the proposal contains proprietary/confidential information the proposer wishes to protect.
user_question: Does this proposal contain proprietary or privileged information requiring protection and submission as a Single Copy Document?

name: Collaborators & Other Affiliations (COA) Information
condition: Required as a Single Copy Document for each individual designated as senior/key personnel.
user_question: Does the proposal identify any senior/key personnel requiring COA information submission?

name: SF LLL, Disclosure of Lobbying Activities
condition: Required as a Single Copy Document only if the organization engages in lobbying activities pertinent to the award, as certified in SAM.
user_question: Is the proposing organization required to submit the SF LLL, Disclosure of Lobbying Activities, based on its SAM certification?

name: Substitute Negotiator Documentation (Former NSF Staff)
condition: Required as a Single Copy Document if a PI/co-PI is a former NSF employee/IPA submitting within one year of leaving NSF.
user_question: Is any PI or co-PI on this proposal a former NSF employee or IPA submitting within one year of their separation?

name: Statement Identifying Nature of Natural or Anthropogenic Event
condition: Required as a Single Copy Document if submitting after a deadline due to a natural/anthropogenic event exception.
user_question: Is this proposal being submitted after the deadline under the natural or anthropogenic event exception?

name: Cognizant Program Officer Approval for Late Submission (Natural/Anthropogenic Event)
condition: Required (if available) as a Single Copy Document if submitting after a deadline due to a natural/anthropogenic event exception.
user_question: Was written approval obtained from the cognizant NSF Program Officer for late submission due to a natural or anthropogenic event?

name: Confidential Budgetary Information Statement
condition: Required as a Single Copy Document if the proposer requests senior/key personnel salary data not be released to reviewers.
user_question: Is the proposer requesting that senior/key personnel salary data be kept confidential from reviewers, requiring a separate itemized statement?

name: Mentoring Plan
condition: Required as a Supplementary Document if the proposal requests funding for postdoctoral scholars OR graduate students.
user_question: Does this proposal request funding to support postdoctoral scholars or graduate students?

name: Data Management and Sharing Plan
condition: Required as a Supplementary Document for all proposals, unless a justification for its absence is provided.
user_question: Is a Data Management and Sharing Plan (or justification for its absence) required for this proposal?

name: Letters of Collaboration
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation only to document substantial, unfunded collaborations.
user_question: Are there substantial, unfunded collaborations essential to this project that need to be documented via Letters of Collaboration?

name: Human Subjects Documentation
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation if the research involves human subjects (may be required post-submission but before award).
user_question: Does the proposed research involve human subjects?

name: Live Vertebrate Animals Documentation
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation if the research involves live vertebrate animals (may be required post-submission but before award).
user_question: Does the proposed research involve live vertebrate animals?

name: Logistical Requirements and Field Plan (Antarctic)
condition: Required as a Supplementary Document for proposals involving Antarctic fieldwork.
user_question: Does this proposal involve fieldwork in Antarctica?

name: RUI Certification / RUI Impact Statement
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation for proposals submitted under the Research in Undergraduate Institutions (RUI) designation.
user_question: Is this proposal being submitted under the Research in Undergraduate Institutions (RUI) designation?

name: Certification of ROA-PUI Eligibility
condition: Required as a Supplementary Document for Research Opportunity Award for PUI (ROA-PUI) supplemental funding requests.
user_question: Is this a supplemental funding request for a Research Opportunity Award for Primarily Undergraduate Institutions (ROA-PUI)?

name: FASED Documentation
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation if requesting Facilitation Awards for Scientists and Engineers with Disabilities.
user_question: Is this proposal requesting Facilitation Awards for Scientists and Engineers with Disabilities (FASED)?

name: GOALI - Industrial PI Confirmation Letter
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation for Grant Opportunities for Academic Liaison with Industry (GOALI) proposals.
user_question: Is this a Grant Opportunities for Academic Liaison with Industry (GOALI) proposal?

name: Biographical Information for Equipment Proposal Auxiliary Users
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation for each auxiliary user listed in an Equipment proposal.
user_question: Is this an Equipment proposal listing auxiliary users?

name: Program Officer Concurrence Email (Planning/RAPID/EAGER/RAISE)
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation for Planning, RAPID, EAGER, or RAISE proposals, obtained after concept outline review.
user_question: Is this a Planning, RAPID, EAGER, or RAISE proposal requiring prior Program Officer concurrence via email?

name: Tribal Nation Approval Documentation
condition: Required as Supplementary Documentation for proposals that may impact Tribal resources or interests.
user_question: Does this proposal potentially impact the resources or interests of a federally recognized Tribal Nation, requiring documentation of consultation or approval?
